emplyment type period.description: This refers to an indefinite employment period, indicating a permanent position without a fixed end date.
This refers to full-time, permanent employment status in Japan.
This term refers to the duration of the employment contract.
This represents the annual salary range for the position, indicating the potential earnings over a year-long period.
This is an example of a specific annual salary (5.49 million yen) and its monthly breakdown, representing a typical employment period of one year.
This is the monthly salary amount, representing the payment for a standard employment period of one month.

emplyment type period.attribute: 時間外労働の有無に関わらず月20時間相当分の時間外手当を支給します
emplyment type period.description: This indicates that overtime pay equivalent to 20 hours per month will be provided regardless of actual overtime worked, representing a consistent monthly benefit throughout the employment period.
These are the standard working hours, representing the daily employment period.
This indicates a full two-day weekend (Saturday and Sunday off), representing the weekly employment period structure.
This refers to the New Year's holiday period, a specific time off during the annual employment cycle.
This refers to the summer holiday period, another specific time off during the annual employment cycle.
This refers to paid leave, a benefit accrued over the employment period.
This refers to maternity leave, a specific period of leave during employment.
Annual salary increase occurs once a year in May.
Bonuses are given twice a year, in June and December.
Every Wednesday, employees can choose between office work and remote work.

emplyment type period.attribute: タイムリーシフト制度マンスリーシフト制度
emplyment type period.description: A flexible working hours system that allows employees to adjust their work hours by up to 1 hour before or after the standard time, in 30-minute increments, on a daily or monthly basis.
This refers to the period after joining the company, during which new employees will be integrated into the data analysis team and learn about the current data infrastructure.

trial preiod.description: This is a 6-month probationary period for new employees. The conditions remain unchanged during this period.
The Rakusmile system, which allows flexible working arrangements for employees with children, becomes available after one year of employment.
This is the initial screening process for job applicants, where their documents are reviewed.
This is the first interview stage in the hiring process, conducted by the department manager and HR representative.
This is an aptitude test that candidates must take as part of the hiring process.
This is the final interview stage in the hiring process, conducted by company executives.

contract renewal.description: This refers to an annual salary increase that occurs in May, which can be considered a form of contract renewal or update.
This refers to bi-annual bonuses in June and December, which can be seen as a form of regular contract renewal or update.
